sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react" const Edit = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState({ name: "", email: "", age: "", mobile: "", work: "", add: "", desc: "", }) const setdata = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value) const { name, value } = e.target setValue((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } console.log(value) return (
